name: Gunman Galore
description:
Description

After a long journey, you have finally reached your objective: The Rogue's Hideout.

The only way in? Your gun!

Shoot your way on 1v1 duels against your enemies and take down the almighty rogue leader.

Entry for Cowboy's Week Jam, following the theme of Wild West.

This game is Windows exclusive.

Controls

Use the ARROW KEYS to move.

When in battle, press Z/SPACE to shoot.

Hold down SHIFT to run.

WARNING: While this game does have a checkpoint function, it does not save your progress when you quit the game. The game however is very short, so it shouldn't be an issue completing it in one sitting.

 

Credits

Excluding sounds, all assets in the game, including music and programming were made by me from scratch during the week period.

Sounds from CC0 sources, Freesound, and some by me.

Paper Textures by: rawpixel.com, Freepik.

Paint Textures by: milano83, Freepik.

Font Used: Western Bang Bang by Galdino Otten
